Actions.Description: Finds a contact by email and updates it. Returns updated contact.

Actions.Description: Gets a contact by Id and returs it.

Actions.Description: Get contacts list

Actions.Description: Creates new contact and returns it.

Actions.Description: Gets organization by Id and returns it

Actions.Description: Gets an organization by title and returns it.
